description: This file defines an interface (ILocalStore) for a local storage system within the WPEFramework plugin namespace. It declares virtual methods for opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entry counts, fetching entries, removing entries, and adding entries. The file also defines a shared pointer type alias for the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for local storage operations including creation, modification, retrieval, and deletion of table entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Open the storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Create a new table in the storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Set a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieve the count of entries in a table, starting from a specific offset, up to a maximum number.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Get a list of entries from a table starting from an index, limited by count.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Remove entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Add a new entry to a specified table.
